entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:14 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 02:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing drizzle before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
